title: EastEnders star Jessie Wallace 'has fallen out with sister Danielle AGAIN'
text:
EastEnders actress Jessie Wallace is reportedly locked in another feud with her sister Danielle Mason after they made-up following a bitter 10 year row.

The soap star's sister revealed that they had a major fall out in March earlier this year and are no longer on speaking terms, reports The Daily Star Sunday.

Jessie and Danielle spent 10 years at loggerheads, after Danielle accused the actress of turning her back on her stepfather Ron Mason, who was battling leukaemia.

Bitter row: EastEnders actress Jessie Wallace (pictured) is reportedly locked in another feud with her sister Danielle Mason after they made-up following a bitter 10 year row

However after attempting to mend their relationship, Danielle revealed to the publication that they have now fallen out again over an incident on her birthday.

She said: 'We've fallen out again. She stitched me up on my birthday, so I got the hump. I just got the nark. We fell out.

'We had a massive row and called each other all the names under the sun. It was worse than anything on a soap opera.'

'She is quite grown up. She doesn't argue back. But I am horrible.'

War of words: Jessie and Danielle spent 10 years at loggerheads, after Danielle accused the actress of turning her back on her stepfather Ron Mason, who was battling leukaemia (pictured in 2017)

Jessie's representatives have been approached for comment by MailOnline.

In April 2018 Jessie and Danielle appeared to have cast their conflict aside on, as they celebrated Easter together for the first time in a decade.

Taking to her Instagram story, glamour model Danielle shared a snap of herself and the EastEnders star, who is her half-sister, hugging as they enjoyed a day of festivity with their family.

The pair looked closer than ever in the snap, as they tightly embraced for the camera - after over a decade of conflict.

An source close to the family told MailOnline at the time: 'They’re stronger than ever and they’ve really pulled through. Everyone’s really proud of them.

Happier times: In April 2018 Jessie and Danielle appeared to have cast their conflict aside on, as they celebrated Easter together for the first time in a decade (pictured above)

'Just like with all siblings, they still have their ups and downs and of course, neither are known to hold back.

'But they’re much tighter now and make up quickly, it’s as if no time has passed really!'

In 2014, Danielle told The Sun that Jessie’s family were reportedly so appalled by her behaviour that they had ‘washed their hands of her’.

Her dad was taken into hospital two months later, and doctors warned his family that he may not survive to see Christmas.

Parted ways: The soap star's sister revealed that they had a major fall out in March earlier this year and are no longer on speaking terms, reports The Daily Star Sunday (Jessie pictured on EastEnders)

Danielle said: ‘Jessie’s behaviour has disgusted us. Dad was dying in intensive care, Mum was in pieces and Jessie couldn’t even be bothered to pick up the phone.’

‘Luckily he pulled through. But if he hadn’t, he would have died without Jessie ever seeing him again. And the worst part of it is I don’t think she cared.’

She claimed that Jessie knew of her stepfather’s condition but had not been to visit him, and sent just two texts to her mother asking about his health.

In one message sent on his diagnosis, Jessie reportedly said she was ‘sorry’ and asked if the family were okay. In the second message Jessie is said to have wished her family a Happy New Year.

Danielle added that Ron, who had been married to her mother Annette for nearly 40 years, helped raise Jessie, saying: ‘He always treated her like his own daughter.

'He would have comforted Jessie when she fell over and scraped her knee, or had nightmares, and lots of her childhood memories will be with him and mum.’

However, the pair resolved their feud in 2016, following Ron's tragic passing.
description: EastEnders actress Jessie Wallace is reportedly locked in another feud with her sister Danielle Mason after they made-up following a bitter 10 year row.
